title: Tahm Kench or Bard
body:
I main support, recently obtained 6300ip. Wondering who to buy? Tahm Kench or Bard. I enjoy playing Leona, Thresh and Braum

Thanks

replies.body:
Tahm is best in Top or Jungle. He's -okay- at support but there are much better picks atm.
Bard is actually a really strong champion in support at the moment, however he takes a lot of game knowledge to utilise his kit to the full potential.
Yeah it is easy to play bard badly. Tricky to play well
Then how do you suggest you play him? Is following the champion spotlight enough? Bc I'm really planning on buying Bard and now you frighten me haha
Tahm is better..  I'm not biased or anything I just main him.fuck bard

I would recommend tahm! I was in the same situation as you were, bard or tahm, and I got tahm. I will never regret it, he was so much fun the first 10-20 games, after that though, he got a little boring... Bards the same though, just less fun and a little bit weaker in my opinion, as tahm kenches W damage is broken against tanks (40% max health damage!) plus, his Q is a nice poke and slow in lane... His ult isn't as useful as bards can be, but it's passive can really buff up your damage. Overall, tahm is just more fun, and does SO much damage for a full tank support... GET DA CATFISH!!!

I reckon Bard because he requires more skill landing his q and ult but that also depends because you like playing Thresh, Leona, Braum (Tanky) I reckon you wold like Tahm Kench because he is quite a tanky Champion
well bard has his ult super troll but tahm can troll pre 6 so probs tahm

Tahm Kench has alot more ticks up his sleeve and is alot easier to use.

Bard, on the other hand, is very situational and requires alot of games/practice to be able to know how to fully utilise his kit.

eh, both of these aren't great supports, they both were pretty underwhelming on launch and are still not as good as most other supports, and tahm kench does better as a jungler anyway, while bard is better as a early rotating support.

But if you play Leona thresh and braum, id suggest picking up alistar or annie,
